_comment_visibility: Controls whether listed classes should be shown or hidden by default.
_comment_generation: Controls how UML files are generated.

_options_generation.each_in_list: Generate one file per class in hideList
_options_generation.each_in_folder: Generate diagrams for all .puml files in the folder

_comment_folders: Specify where UML files are read and where rendered diagrams are stored.
_comment_hideList: These Unity/system classes are hidden or shown depending on defaultVisibility.
